verses.verse: If <WG1487> then <WG3767> ye <WG4891> were raised <WG4891> together with Christ <WG5547>, seek <WG2212> the things that are <WG3588> above <WG507>, where <WG3757> Christ <WG5547> is <WG2521>, seated on <WG1722> the right hand <WG1188> of God <WG2316>.
Set your mind <WG5426> on the things <WG3588> that are above <WG507>, not <WG3361> on the things <WG3588> that are upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.
For <WG1063> ye died <WG599>, and <WG2532> your <WG5216> life <WG2222> is hid <WG2928> with <WG4862> Christ <WG5547> in <WG1722> God <WG2316>.

When <WG3752> Christ <WG5547>, who is our <WG2257> life <WG2222>, shall be manifested <WG5319>, then <WG5119> shall <WG5319> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> with <WG4862> him <WG846> be manifested <WG5319> in <WG1722> glory <WG1391>.

Put to death <WG3499> therefore <WG3767> your <WG5216> members <WG3196> which <WG3588> are upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>: fornication <WG4202>, uncleanness <WG167>, passion <WG3806>, evil <WG2556> desire <WG1939>, and <WG2532> covetousness <WG4124>, which <WG3748> is <WG2076> idolatry <WG1495>;
for <WG1223> which things <WG3739>' sake <WG1223> cometh <WG2064> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> upon <WG1909> the sons <WG5207> of disobedience <WG543>:
wherein3739, 1722 ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> once <WG4218> walked <WG4043>, when <WG3753> ye lived <WG2198> in <WG1722> these things <WG846>;

but <WG1161> now <WG3570> do ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> put them <WG3956> all away <WG659>: anger <WG3709>, wrath <WG2372>, malice <WG2549>, railing <WG988>, shameful speaking <WG148> out of <WG1537> your <WG5216> mouth <WG4750>:
lie <WG5574> not <WG3361> one <WG240> to <WG1519> another <WG240>; seeing that ye have put off <WG554> the old <WG3820> man <WG444> with <WG4862> his <WG846> doings <WG4234>,

and <WG2532> have put on <WG1746> the new <WG3501> man <WG341>, that is being renewed unto <WG1519> knowledge <WG1922> after <WG2596> the image <WG1504> of him <WG846> that created <WG2936> him <WG846>:

where <WG3699> there cannot <WG3756> be <WG1762> Greek <WG1672> and <WG2532> Jew <WG2453>, circumcision <WG4061> and <WG2532> uncircumcision <WG203>, barbarian <WG915>, Scythian <WG4658>, bondman <WG1401>, freeman <WG1658>; but <WG235> Christ <WG5547> is all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> all <WG3956>.

Put on <WG1746> therefore <WG3767>, as <WG5613> God <WG2316>'s elect <WG1588>, holy <WG40> and <WG2532> beloved <WG25>, a heart <WG4698> of compassion <WG3628>, kindness <WG5544>, lowliness <WG5012>, meekness <WG4236>, longsuffering <WG3115>;

forbearing <WG430> one another <WG240>, and <WG2532> forgiving <WG5483> each other <WG1438>, if <WG1437> any man <WG5100> have <WG2192> a complaint <WG3437> against <WG4314> any <WG5100>; even <WG2532> as <WG2531> the Lord <WG5547> forgave <WG5483> you <WG5213>, so <WG3779> also <WG2532> do ye <WG5210>:
and <WG1161> above <WG1909> all <WG3956> these things <WG5125> put on love <WG26>, which <WG3748> is <WG2076> the bond <WG4886> of perfectness <WG5047>.

And <WG2532> let <WG1018> the peace <WG1515> of Christ <WG2316> rule <WG1018> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>, to <WG1519> the which <WG3739> also <WG2532> ye were called <WG2564> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983>; and <WG2532> be ye <WG1096> thankful <WG2170>.

Let <WG1774> the word <WG3056> of Christ <WG5547> dwell <WG1774> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> richly <WG4146>; in <WG1722> all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678> teaching <WG1321> and <WG2532> admonishing <WG3560> one another <WG1438> with psalms <WG5568> and <WG2532> hymns <WG5215> and <WG2532> spiritual <WG4152> songs <WG5603>, singing <WG103> with <WG1722> grace <WG5485> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> unto God <WG2962>.

And2532, 3748 whatsoever <WG3956> ye do <WG302>, <WG4160> in <WG1722> word <WG3056> or <WG2228> in <WG1722> deed <WG2041>, do all <WG3956> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>, giving thanks <WG2168> to God <WG2316> the <WG2532> Father <WG3962> through <WG1223> him <WG846>.
Wives <WG1135>, be in subjection <WG5293> to your <WG2398> husbands <WG435>, as <WG5613> is fitting <WG433> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>.
Husbands <WG435>, love <WG25> your wives <WG1135>, and <WG2532> be <WG4087> not <WG3361> bitter <WG4087> against <WG4314> them <WG846>.
Children <WG5043>, obey <WG5219> your parents <WG1118> in <WG2596> all things <WG3956>, for <WG1063> this <WG5124> is <WG2076> well-pleasing <WG2101> in the Lord <WG2962>.
Fathers <WG3962>, provoke <WG2042> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> children <WG5043>, that <WG3361> they be not discouraged <WG120>.

Servants <WG1401>, obey <WG5219> in <WG2596> all things <WG3956> them that are your masters <WG2962> according to <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>; not <WG3361> with <WG1722> eye-service <WG3787>, as <WG5613> men-pleasers <WG441>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> singleness <WG572> of heart <WG2588>, fearing <WG5399> the Lord <WG2316>:
<WG2532> whatsoever3956, 3748, 1437 ye do <WG4160>, work <WG2038> heartily <WG1537>, <WG5590> as <WG5613> unto the Lord <WG2962>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> unto men <WG444>;

knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> from <WG575> the Lord <WG2962> ye shall receive <WG618> the recompense <WG469> of the inheritance <WG2817>: <WG1063> ye serve <WG1398> the Lord <WG2962> Christ <WG5547>.
For <WG1161> he that doeth wrong <WG91> shall receive again for the wrong <WG2865> that <WG3739> he hath done <WG91>: and <WG2532> there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> respect of persons <WG4382>.
